title: The Phantom Creeps 1939 (Action, Horror, Sci-Fi) Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent, Dorothy Arnold

sources.title: The Phantom Creeps 1939 (Action, Horror, Sci-Fi) Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent, Dorothy Arnold
sources.description:
CRASHING... SMASHING... DASHING DYNAMITE! 12 spine-shivering chapters of thunderbolt action and amazing adventure!
Brilliant but mad scientist, Dr. Alex Zorka, threatens global security with his deadly inventions, including a giant robot and an invisibility belt. After his wifeâ€™s death, Zorka vows to conquer the world, but his bumbling assistant, Monk, repeatedly sabotages his schemes. A military intelligence officer and a pretty reporter try to find Zorka, whose inventions can destroy the world. As foreign spies and government agents race to stop him, the determined officer and savvy reporter team up to thwart Zorka's plans and save the world.

Original title: The Phantom Creeps (1939)


Directors: Ford Beebe, Saul A. Goodkind
Writers: George H. Plympton, Basil Dickey 
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent, Dorothy Arnold 
Genres: Classics, Cult, Made for TV, Action, Horror, Sci-Fi

Total runtime: 4 hours
